title: Defining neurosymbolic AI
summary:
Here is a 2-line summary of the abstract:

Neurosymbolic AI aims to integrate learning and reasoning by combining logical and neural representations, but lacks a universally accepted definition. The authors propose a formal definition of neurosymbolic AI, which they define as the computation of an integral over a product of a logical and a belief function.

title: Reasoning in Neurosymbolic AI
summary:
Here is a 2-line summary of the abstract:

A neurosymbolic AI system is proposed that can represent and reason formally about any propositional logic formula, combining learning from data and knowledge with logical reasoning. This system addresses challenges in data efficiency, fairness, and safety of Large Language Models and has the potential to promote the principled integration of reasoning and learning in deep networks.

title: Neurosymbolic Reinforcement Learning and Planning: A Survey
summary:
Here is a 2-line summary of the abstract:

The abstract discusses the emerging field of Neurosymbolic Reinforcement Learning (Neurosymbolic RL), which combines the benefits of traditional reinforcement learning with the transparency and explainability of symbolic AI. The paper conducts a literature survey of Neurosymbolic RL, categorizing works into three taxonomies and analyzing the RL components of each research work to identify research opportunities and challenges.
authors: C. M. J. M. Dourado Jr

title: Relational Neurosymbolic Markov Models
summary:
Here is a 2-line summary of the abstract:

The authors introduce relational neurosymbolic Markov models (NeSy-MMs), a new class of end-to-end differentiable sequential models that integrate and provably satisfy relational logical constraints. These models can solve problems beyond the current state-of-the-art in neurosymbolic AI and provide strong guarantees with respect to desired properties, while also being more interpretable and adaptable to out-of-distribution scenarios.

title: A Complexity Map of Probabilistic Reasoning for Neurosymbolic Classification Techniques
summary:
Here is a 2-line summary of the abstract:

Neurosymbolic AI aims to combine neural networks with symbolic systems to improve classification, and informed multi-label classification is a sub-field that leverages prior knowledge to enhance neural classification. This paper develops a unified formalism for probabilistic reasoning problems and creates a complexity map to assess the scalability of neurosymbolic techniques, helping practitioners navigate the scalability landscape.

title: Scallop: A Language for Neurosymbolic Programming
summary:
Here is a 2-line summary of the abstract:

Scallop is a language that combines deep learning and logical reasoning, enabling users to write and train neurosymbolic applications efficiently. It achieves this through a flexible symbolic representation, a declarative logic programming language, and a framework for automatic differentiable reasoning, outperforming state-of-the-art models in accuracy, runtime, and other aspects.

title: On the Promise for Assurance of Differentiable Neurosymbolic Reasoning Paradigms
summary:
Here is a 2-line summary of the abstract:

This study evaluates the assurance of end-to-end fully differentiable neurosymbolic systems, which combine artificial neural networks with symbolic reasoning, across various tasks and domains. The results show that these systems offer unique opportunities for assurance, particularly in cases where arithmetic operations are defined and input spaces are high-dimensional, but also highlight potential trade-offs between interpretability and adversarial vulnerability.

title: A Path Less Traveled: Reimagining Software Engineering Automation via a Neurosymbolic Paradigm
summary:
Here is a 2-line summary of the abstract:

The emergence of Large Code Models has transformed software engineering automation, but it comes with trade-offs such as high computational costs and reduced interpretability. Neurosymbolic Software Engineering, a new paradigm, combines neural learning with symbolic reasoning and introduces controlled chaos to enhance efficiency, reliability, and transparency in AI-driven software engineering.

title: Model-Grounded Symbolic Artificial Intelligence Systems Learning and Reasoning with Model-Grounded Symbolic Artificial Intelligence Systems
summary:
Here is a 2-line summary of the abstract:

Neurosymbolic AI combines neural networks and symbolic AI to leverage strengths in learning and reasoning. This work reinterprets large language models as model-grounded symbolic AI systems, allowing for novel learning and reasoning approaches that improve efficiency and reliability.

title: On the use of neurosymbolic AI for defending against cyber attacks
summary:
Here is a 2-line summary of the abstract:

The abstract argues that while all cyber attacks cannot be prevented, combining connectionist and symbolic AI using neurosymbolic AI can improve detection and response capabilities. The authors propose several neurosymbolic use cases and demonstrate feasibility through two proof-of-concept experiments, highlighting potential research directions and impact on the cybersecurity field.
